participant_1.background:
I play for fun, but I know I need to be more careful with my spending.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
i have a cat named felix and a small terror names emmy.
i m looking for a job.
I take a break from playing the guitar and eat a banana to replenish my energy.

participant_2.background:
My birthday was a day of fun and celebration with my loved ones.
I'm retired and not very tall, but I'm content with my life.
my favorite movie is 16 candles.
I'm proud of my ability to keep a positive attitude even when things are tough.
My family loves spending time outdoors with our dog.

content.text: It was amazing, it was my birthday!
Oh wow, happy birthday! How old are you now?
That's amazing, I hope you have a wonderful day!
Thank you, I'm spending it with my family and friends.
That's great, I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
I know I will, we're going to watch my favorite movie, 16 candles.
Oh, I love that movie! It's so funny.
It is, I always laugh when I watch it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends, we go on a lot of trips together.
That sounds really nice, I wish I had more time to do that.
You should make some time, it's really important to spend time with the people you love.
I know you're right, I'll try to make more of an effort.
Good, I'm sure your family would really appreciate it.
Thanks for the advice, I really appreciate it.
No problem, I'm always happy to help.
